name: Solution Architect (Electrical Architect)
description:
Responsibilities:
  • Participate in DC pre-sales technical communication and technical solution outputing.
  • Take charge of DC electrical system design(HLD,LLD)
  • Taka charge of electrical shop drawings.
  • Summarize and build best solution based on project.
Position requirements:

  • Education background: Electrical Engineering

  • Work experience: More than 10 years

  • Candidate with more than 10000 sqm data center designing experience is preferred.
  • Very familiar with UPS/DC Power/Generator/10kV power distribution system designing principle
  • Being able to output power system AutoCAD drawing.
  • Very familiar with power standard, including GB050174, Uptime standard, TIA-942
  • Candidate with registered electrical designer certificate, Uptime ATD certificate is preferred.

  • Language(optional): Fluent in English

  • Professional certifications from third parties (optional): registered electrical designer certificate, Uptime ATD certificate

Conditions:

  • Official employment in the staff of the partner company*.
  • Mobile payment;
  • Cozy office in BC Krylatsky hills;
  • Friendly team;
  • Work experience in an international company;
  • Discount on company products.

*Term employment contract with recruitment agency.
